sourcesContent:
import React,{ useEffect} from 'react'; import {useSelector, useDispatch} from"react-redux" import { getDetail } from '../actions/index'; import {useParams, Link} from "react-router-dom" import style from "./styles/Detail.module.css" const Detail =()=>{ let {id} = useParams(); const details = useSelector((state)=>state.detail) const dispatch= useDispatch(); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getDetail(id)) },[dispatch, id]) return(

{details.name}

Acronym:

{details.cca3}

Continent :

{details.continents}

Capital :

{details.capital}

Sub Region :

{details.subregion}

Area :

{details.area} Km²

Population :

{details.population}

Activities :

{details.activities?.map((e)=>{ return(

{e.name}

Duration: {e.duration} hours

Difficulty: {e.dificulty}

Seasson: {e.seasson}

) })}
); }; export default Detail;
